title: Ticket #651: remove MPI universe documentation
description: Erik suggests that section 2.9.5 on the MPI Universe be completely removed from the manual. The section announces itself as included for reference and outdated, but it is time (as agreed by Greg) to remove the section. Removal is being done on the master, such that it will appear in the next stable series. Current stable series should not have a feature change as this will appear to be.
remarks: Hopefully purged the MPI universe completely from the manual. Modified lots of files to do this.
creator: smoler
